newsitem.title: USA: Muni sales total $400 mln for Wednesday, April 2.
newsitem.headline: Muni sales total $400 mln for Wednesday, April 2.

text.p: Municipal bond sales for Wednesday, April 2 are expected to total $400 million in 21 sales, according to Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group.
Negotiated offerings total $347 million in 12 sales, with a $121 million Louisana Public Facilities Authority deal through Merrill Lynch & Co. topping the the list.
On the competitive side, nine sales totaling $53 million are on the schedule, a $18 million Middletown, Conn., deal at 1130 EST is the largest.
An additional seven sales totaling $144 million are on the possible calender, meaning underwriters have said they may price the bonds Wednesday, depending on market conditions.
